title: Beautiful Home Minutes All Shopping & Restaurants
posting_body: Tired of living in tiny apartments?
Come visit us at our gorgeous community where you can get a SPACIOUS, AFFORDABLE, LUXURIOUS home!
Perfect for the kids and pets!
Forget about breed restrictions or pet fees!
Custom cabinetry and natural granite countertops
Minutes from all shopping and restaurants
Own for LESS - low monthly payment
If you are responding by email, please include your contact information.
*P & I. Price $559,900, 5.875% Fixed/5.931% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
Home pictured may display decorator items and furniture which are not available for purchase even upon additional payment.
Please consult an LGI Homes new home consultant and review a home sales contract for additional information and disclosures.
